channel.title: HDD Missing? EDIT: NEW INFO
channel.description:
Hello. I posted a few weeks ago about the jetty fail. I didn't read those answers until now because I forgot I had posted here. Now I need some help. When this happened I didn't know that is was gone. Okay... Lets start with the info. This was my dads old computer. It's a Desktop computer. He have put some extra things like an extra sata 360GB hard disk. And 2GB Ram and stuff. Now when this error with Jetty happened I just reinstalled Ubuntu using my "live cd" but i think the first hdd messed up. So now I realise I deleted all the backup files in the newest hdd to install windows vista and ubuntu. I can't find the first hard disk I messed up. I have opened the machine and they are both still plugged in. Here is some pictures of the disk manager.
[IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt292/kneistol/screenshot3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt292/kneistol/screenshot2-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt292/kneistol/screenshot1-2.png[/img]
I have now divided the working harddisk into two pieces. One with vista and one with ubuntu. But I'm missing my old backup harddisk.
If you wonder about the computer and all the things we have put inside it and the specifications or something. just ask. Please i need help. We have backup of the backup so i have the posibility to reformat it or something like that. Please help me :)

item.title: HDD Missing? EDIT: NEW INFO
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

Hello. I posted a few weeks ago about the jetty fail. I didn’t read those answers until now because I forgot I had posted here. Now I need some help.
When this happened I didn’t know that is was gone. Okay… Lets start with the info. This was my dads old computer. It’s a Desktop computer.
He have put some extra things like an extra sata 360GB hard disk. And 2GB Ram and stuff. Now when this error with Jetty happened I just reinstalled
Ubuntu using my “live cd” but i think the first hdd messed up. So now I realise I deleted all the backup files in the newest hdd to install windows vista and ubuntu.
I can’t find the first hard disk I messed up. I have opened the machine and they are both still plugged in. Here is some pictures of the disk manager.



I have now divided the working harddisk into two pieces. One with vista and one with ubuntu. But I’m missing my old backup harddisk.

If you wonder about the computer and all the things we have put inside it and the specifications or something. just ask. Please i need help.
We have backup of the backup so i have the posibility to reformat it or something like that. Please help me
